channel.title: Black Mesa in other languages ?
channel.description:
Hello I just installed the latest version of Black Mesa. No issues encountered,and enhanced graphic is very good (I have a GTX690), but I wonder if there is a French version, or if a patch translation (sound dialogs especially). Otherwise it is planned soon?
Thanks.

item.title: Black Mesa in other languages ?
item.dc:creator: Chickenprotector
item.description:
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=12534

Dubbed versions of the sounds don’t exist yet.

Read full topic
